ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: O.J.R. is thankful to the H2020 - ERC-2017-Advanced Grant BioELCell (788489) for funding support. We gratefully acknowledge the Academy of Finland through Center of Excellence of Molecular Engineering of Biosynthetic Hybrid Materials Research and the Finnish Flagship program under the cluster Aalto-VTT CERES Materials Bioeconomy. L.G.G. acknowledges funding by Aalto University School of Chemical Engineering doctoral program.
